rules_text:
Vigilance, haste
[i]Masked Protector[/i] – Whenever Conrad, Unmasked Knight enters, is turned face up, or another creature you control is turned face up, support 1 and draw a card. [i](To support 1, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Disguise {R}{W} [i](You may cast this card face down for {3} as a 2/2 creature with ward {2}. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.)[/i]
